title: Someone just told me Udyr was a lot better than WW...
body:
His major basis: "He can spam spells and has lots of attack speed, and can stun with his auto attacks"

He also said that Warwick has no lifesteal because I didn't build any lifesteal items (his passive was just "regen"), and Ravenous Hydra was a good item on him.
Suddenly I don't feel as bad any more at this game :S.
